data.transfer.updater

Class ApplicationUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.transfer.updater.ApplicationUpdater

  • public class ApplicationUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles basic coordination for the update of one application.
    Author:
    Thomas Debouverie

      • ApplicationUpdater

        public ApplicationUpdater(java.lang.String executableName)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new instance for given executable name.
        Parameters:
        executableName - Name of the executable for the application to update.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the executable name does not match any of the known applications.

        public void startUpdate(javafx.stage.Window window,
                        boolean executeWhenDone,
                        java.lang.Runnable completionRunnable)
        Starts the update.
        Parameters:
        window - Window in which any dialog will be presented
        executeWhenDone - If true, the application that is updated will be started directly once the update is finished
        completionRunnable - Completion to run when finished
